channel.title: Objects/how to save them so they don't go away when i log out?!
channel.description:
I'm editing a 562 source, and I want to add objects in it, but whenever I log out or teleport anywhere it's gone and no one else can see my objects when I add them :mad:
I'm adding objects In-Game, not in my files/codes*
Please help me on this..
~~Sophie

item.title: Objects/how to save them so they don't go away when i log out?!
item.dc:creator: @sophie94 sophie94
item.description:
@sophie94 wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:8, topic:330256”]Hmm alright, so you like taking the hard way. I’ve got no problems with that.

BUT, very few people actually know how to code 562’s. There are almost no tutorials, and very little to help you when you find errors.
A lot of people will TRY to help you (like right here in this topic), but most will give solutions that work on 317’s, but not on 562’s because they are totally different.[/quote]I understand, but I know how to fix other stuff like NPCs Spawning etc…But about the objects thing…I cant find the codes/files to the objects…:S:S

Read full topic
item.source: Objects/how to save them so they don't go away when i log out?!

item.title: Objects/how to save them so they don't go away when i log out?!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Hmm alright, so you like taking the hard way. I’ve got no problems with that.

BUT, very few people actually know how to code 562’s. There are almost no tutorials, and very little to help you when you find errors.
A lot of people will TRY to help you (like right here in this topic), but most will give solutions that work on 317’s, but not on 562’s because they are totally different.

Read full topic
item.source: Objects/how to save them so they don't go away when i log out?!

item.title: Objects/how to save them so they don't go away when i log out?!
item.dc:creator: @sophie94 sophie94
item.description:
@sophie94 wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:6, topic:330256”]Now I’ve got a few questions…

Did you ever code before?
Do you have any java knowledge?

If not, I certainly would not recommend starting a 562.
562’s are very advanced servers for as far as I know.
If I were you, i’d start with 317’s, like everyone else.[/quote]I’d like to learn from top to bottom:)from hard to easy ?

Read full topic
